resources.string: Network (WIFI) connectivity Lost, please check your network.
The server is taking to long to respond, this can be caused by either poor connectivity or an error with the server. Please verify both.
The Email you entered is not valid. Please check and try again.
Sorry, the Password you entered is incorrect. Please double-check your password and try again.
The server could not process your request please try again, if the problem persist contact support.
Server unreachable, please verify is online and working properly.
User disabled, Please contact the administrator.
You need to confirm your account (E-mail).
